item.title: 【Cinema Center】MOVIE - Read.It.and.Weep.2006.1080p.DSNP.WEB-DL.DDP5.1.H.264-Samuel
item.description:
Read It and Weep

Alternate Artwork 1 | Alternate Artwork 2 | Alternate Artwork 3 | Alternate Artwork 4 | Alternate Artwork 5 | Alternate Artwork 6 | Alternate Artwork 7 | Alternate Artwork 8 | Poster 1 | Poster 2 | Poster 3 | Key Art


2006 • 1h 25m
Drama, Coming of Age, Comedy

Description
Jamie goes from regular girl to media darling after her journal is accidentally turned in for a writing contest and becomes a best-selling book.
Click to expand...
Trailers
Click to expand...
More Information
Long Description:
When her journal is accidentally published and becomes an overnight success, Jamie cannot help but get caught up in her newfound celebrity status. Between book signings, interviews and her new boyfriend, Jamie struggles to find a balance between her old life and her new one. She doesn’t want to lose her friends or change who she is, but she can't escape "IS," the star of her novel—and her alter ego—who is pushing her to embrace her life as a celebrity.
Duration: 1h 25m
Release Date: 2006
Genre: Drama, Coming of Age, Comedy
Rating:
Director: Paul Hoen
Starring: Kay Panabaker, Danielle Panabaker, Alexandra Krosney, Marquise C. Brown, Allison Scagliotti, Jason Dolley
Click to expand...
